item.title: Amazon Advertising Transactional Emails
item.description: The following are samples of emails Veronica drafted for the Amazon Advertising Platform. They’re based on the following brand voice tenets: Sound like people talking to people Professional but conversational Stay grounded in stories and needs of actual advertising customers Campaign submitted Hello {First Name}, Thank you for using Amazon Advertising to advertise your products. Your campaign “{Campaign name}” is currently under review by our moderators. The review process is usually completed within 24 hours, but may take as long as 3 business days.
